com.purplebrain.adbuddiz.sdk

Interface AdBuddizDelegate


  • public interface AdBuddizDelegate
    Interface for Interstitial related events

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void didCacheAd()
      Called when the next ad is ready to be displayed.
      void didClick()
      Called when the user clicked on the ad.
      void didFailToShowAd(AdBuddizError error)
      Called when the SDK is unable to display an ad when AdBuddiz.showAd(android.app.Activity) is called.
      void didHideAd()
      Called when the ad has been hidden.
      void didShowAd()
      Called when an ad has been displayed.

    • Method Detail

      • didCacheAd

        void didCacheAd()
        Called when the next ad is ready to be displayed.

      • didShowAd

        void didShowAd()
        Called when an ad has been displayed.

      • didFailToShowAd

        void didFailToShowAd(AdBuddizError error)
        Called when the SDK is unable to display an ad when AdBuddiz.showAd(android.app.Activity) is called. The error code explains the reason.
        See Also:
        AdBuddizError

      • didClick

        void didClick()
        Called when the user clicked on the ad.

      • didHideAd

        void didHideAd()
        Called when the ad has been hidden.
